title: Code
description: Discover how to display and highlight code snippets.

meta.title: LNGRZUI | Code Documentation
meta.description: Discover how to display and highlight code snippets.
meta.keywords: component library, reusable components, documentation, application development, UI toolkit

content.overview-desc: The Code page highlights the Code component, which allows you to display formatted code snippets in your application.
content.how-to-desc: Import the Code component, and pass the desired code snippet as the child of the Code. Customize the appearance of the code using the provided props.
content.content-one: This is a sample paragraph code using html language
